Phobia hears the transmission from Zardus, he didn't have much 
information on the bot but what he had said trouble. "Ah another 
piece of this puzzle called exiatence" he thought knowing full well 
what Zardus was capable of.

He again spoke through his baby "KitKat don't respond, I'll handle 
this."

Phobia opened a channel to Zardus "This is Phobia, We deeply 
appreciate your kind gesture we have everything under control on this 
end if you will kindly keep the maximals off our back." He knew the 
game they played was one of strategy. if the alliance knew that 
KitKat was in charge they'd know that Megatron had abandoned them. 
With that knowlege the alliance might change thier alliance.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/The Oblitercons::
> 
> Hovering in the air, Zardus fires a few more shots at Deemos,
> frowning 
> when he sees the Predacons running. These Maximals wern't tough at 
> all, the Alliance commander thinks, looking down at the Maximals 
who 
> had done this much damage to the Predacon cave, and were now being 
> shot at by his troops. Zardus was a bit surprised at how soft the 
> Predacons have gotten, letting the Maximals get them like this.
> 
> He activates his comm-link. "Predacon commander," he says into it, 
> sending the transmission on a Predacon frequency, "This is Zardus. 
My 
> troops are currently taking out the Maximals in your area, do you
> need 
> further assistance?"
> 
> Usually, Zardus would be glad to leave the Predacons to die, but 
not 
> in this case. If the Predacons fell, there would be nothing to stop 
> the Maximals from attacking the Alliance. 
> 
> Having finished the transmission, Zardus fires a few more shots at 
> Deemos.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> With the sound of gunfire, Dark One, in his jet mode, flies into 
the 
> battlefield. He flies by Deemos, sending a volley of laser shots at 
> the Maximal.
> 
> Behind him, his group runs out of the foilage, opening fire on the 
> Maximals. Pyro fires two fireballs at Deemos.
> 
> Hiss jumps into the air, transforming into his gun mode and flying 
at 
> Testifier, opening fire.
> 
> Breakdown stops a little ways from Blender and Stronghold, 
> transforming into an artillery cannon and opening fire on the two 
> Maximals, shooting lasers.
> 
> Scavanger runs at Testifier, firing his chai
